name: Eu vou para a EPM
description:
The goal of the game is to reach EPM with the largest number of colleagues to run one of the courses that EPM offers you. For this you will drive the MiniBus of the ADA collecting colleagues, but attention you can not hit the cars and obstacles that appear if you do not lose energy.

Attention is about my first game made a few years ago (2012). It was intended to be offered to potential students in promoting the school in fairs and stands.
